css.editor: .solarized_light{color:#657b83}.solarized_light a{color:#268bd2}.solarized_light table tr:nth-child(even){background: #FFF9E6}.solarized_light table th{background:#fdf6e3}.solarized_light table td,.solarized_light table th{border-color:#eee8d5}.solarized_light blockquote{color:#93a1a1}.solarized_light hr{background-color:#93a1a1}.solarized_light code{background-color:rgba(238,232,213,0.1)}.solarized_light svg{background-color:#fdf6e3}.solarized_light .text-cell [style]{color:#657b83 !important;background-color:transparent !important}.solarized_light .diagram-cell .ace_editor,.solarized_light .latex-cell .ace_editor,.solarized_light .markdown-cell .ace_editor{color:#657b83;background-color:#fdf6e3}.solarized_light .markdown-cell .ace_list{color:#657b83}.solarized_light .cell.inEditMode{border-color:#eee8d5}.ace-solarized-light .ace_static_highlight.ace_show_gutter{background: #FBF1D3; border-radius: 5px;padding: .5em 0;}.ace-solarized-light .ace_gutter.ace_gutter-cell{border-radius: 5px; color: #62767B}.solarized_light code{background-color: #FBF1D3;padding: .2em .4em}
css.preview: .solarized_light{color:#657b83}.solarized_light a{color:#268bd2}.solarized_light table tr:nth-child(even){background: #FFF9E6}.solarized_light table th{background:#fdf6e3}.solarized_light table td,.solarized_light table th{border-color:#eee8d5}.solarized_light blockquote{color:#93a1a1}.solarized_light hr{background-color:#93a1a1}.solarized_light code{background-color:rgba(238,232,213,0.1)}.solarized_light svg{background-color:#fdf6e3}.solarized_light .text-cell [style]{color:#657b83 !important;background-color:transparent !important}.solarized_light #tag-field{margin:8px 2px}.solarized_light #tag-field .tag{background:#fdf6e3;border-radius:2px;color:#657b83}.ace-solarized-light .ace_static_highlight.ace_show_gutter{background: #FBF1D3; border-radius: 5px;padding: .5em 0;}.ace-solarized-light .ace_gutter.ace_gutter-cell{border-radius: 5px; color: #62767B}.solarized_light code{background-color: #FBF1D3;padding: .2em .4em}
css.presentation: .solarized_light{color:#657b83}.solarized_light a{color:#268bd2}.solarized_light table tr:nth-child(even){background: #FFF9E6}.solarized_light table th{background:#fdf6e3}.solarized_light table td,.solarized_light table th{border-color:#eee8d5}.solarized_light blockquote{color:#93a1a1}.solarized_light hr{background-color:#93a1a1}.solarized_light code{background-color:rgba(238,232,213,0.1)}.solarized_light svg{background-color:#fdf6e3}.solarized_light .text-cell [style]{color:#657b83 !important;background-color:transparent !important}.ace-solarized-light .ace_static_highlight.ace_show_gutter{background: #FBF1D3; border-radius: 5px;padding: .5em 0;}.ace-solarized-light .ace_gutter.ace_gutter-cell{border-radius: 5px; color: #62767B}.solarized_light code{background-color: #FBF1D3;padding: .2em .4em}
